content: this is a cute simple frog pattern all you really need to know is how to join pieces together materials yarn crafter s secret cotton in lime lily sugar n cream in rose lily sugar n cream in black hook size 3 5mm scissors yarn needle stitch marker 6mm safety eyes or black yarn terminology us terms mc - magic_ring chain - chain slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet increase - increase two single_crochet in one stitch decrease - decrease take front loop of next two stitches single_crochet through those invisible finish - pull the thread through as though you were normally finishing then loop through the next stitch with the needle so it looks like the stitches keep going *repeat inside asterisks* yardage lime - 14 1 yards very small amount of rose and black for embroidery finished size 4 inches from foot to top of head
